SEARCH

Class UIBuilderLibrary

java.lang.Object
UIBuilderLibrary
public class UIBuilderLibrary extends Object
A component building toolset for Java Swing components using a spring layout system. Each component is passed to the appropriate method which sets its base parameters, position and configuration before returning it to the caller.

  • Method Details

    • BuildJLabelWithNorthWestAnchor

      public static JLabel BuildJLabelWithNorthWestAnchor(String text, int hPad, int vPad, SpringLayout layout, Component other)
      Takes a provided JLabel and configures it based upon the provided parameters using a Spring Layout system. The label will be positioned by the spring layout using the top left (North-West) corner of the label vs the top left of another component.
      Parameters:
      text - The text to be printed to the label
      hPad - The horizontal padding distance between the 2 objects
      vPad - The vertical padding distance between the 2 objects
      layout - The spring layout object used for positioning
      other - The component which the label will be located in association to.
      Returns:
      A completed and setup JLabel ready to be added to a Frame

    • BuildJLabelInlineToRight

      public static JLabel BuildJLabelInlineToRight(String text, int hPad, SpringLayout layout, Component other)
      Takes a provided JLabel and configures it based upon the provided parameters using a Spring Layout system. The label will be positioned by the spring layout to be inline horizontally and to the direct right to a designated component.
      Parameters:
      text - The text to be printed to the label
      hPad - The horizontal padding distance between the 2 objects
      layout - The spring layout object used for positioning
      other - The component which the label will be located in association to.
      Returns:
      A completed and setup JLabel ready to be added to a Frame

    • BuildJLabelInlineBelow

      public static JLabel BuildJLabelInlineBelow(String text, int vPad, SpringLayout layout, Component other)
      Takes a provided JLabel and configures it based upon the provided parameters using a Spring Layout system. The label will be positioned by the spring layout to be inline vertically and directly beneath the designated component.
      Parameters:
      text - The text to be printed to the label
      vPad - The vertical padding distance between the 2 objects
      layout - The spring layout object used for positioning
      other - The component which the label will be located in association to.
      Returns:
      A completed and setup JLabel ready to be added to a Frame

    • BuildJTextFieldWithNorthWestAnchor

      public static JTextField BuildJTextFieldWithNorthWestAnchor(int size, int hPad, int vPad, SpringLayout layout, Component other)
      Takes a provided JTextField and configures it based upon the provided parameters using a Spring Layout system. The field will be positioned by the spring layout using the top left (North-West) corner of the field vs the top left of another component.
      Parameters:
      size - The width in columns the text field size will be set to (1 column = 1 lower case 'm' in current font setting)
      hPad - The horizontal padding distance between the 2 objects
      vPad - The vertical padding distance between the 2 objects
      layout - The spring layout object used for positioning
      other - The component which the text field will be located in association to.
      Returns:
      A completed and setup TJextField ready to be added to a Frame

    • BuildJTextFieldInlineToRight

      public static JTextField BuildJTextFieldInlineToRight(int size, int hPad, SpringLayout layout, Component other)
      Takes a provided JTextField and configures it based upon the provided parameters using a Spring Layout system. The field will be positioned by the spring layout to be directly inline horizontally and to the right side of the designated component
      Parameters:
      size - The width in columns the text field size will be set to (1 column = 1 lower case 'm' in current font setting)
      hPad - The horizontal padding distance between the 2 objects
      layout - The spring layout object used for positioning
      other - The component which the text field will be located in association to.
      Returns:
      A completed and setup TJextField ready to be added to a Frame

    • BuildJTextFieldInlineBelow

      public static JTextField BuildJTextFieldInlineBelow(int size, int vPad, SpringLayout layout, Component other)
      Takes a provided JTextField and configures it based upon the provided parameters using a Spring Layout system. The field will be positioned by the spring layout to be directly inline vertically and to the bottom of the designated component
      Parameters:
      size - The width in columns the text field size will be set to (1 column = 1 lower case 'm' in current font setting)
      vPad - The vertical padding distance between the 2 objects
      layout - The spring layout object used for positioning
      other - The component which the text field will be located in association to.
      Returns:
      A completed and setup TJextField ready to be added to a Frame

    • BuildJButtonWithNorthWestAnchor

      public static JButton BuildJButtonWithNorthWestAnchor(int width, int height, String text, int hPad, int vPad, ActionListener listener, SpringLayout layout, Component other)
      Takes a provided JButton and configures it based upon the provided parameters using a Spring Layout system. The JButton will be positioned by the spring layout using the top left (North-West) corner of the JButton vs the top left of another component.
      Parameters:
      width - The preferred width of the button
      height - The preferred height of the button
      text - The text to be printed on the button
      hPad - The horizontal padding distance between the 2 objects
      vPad - The vertical padding distance between the 2 objects
      listener - The listener object to be informed when the button is pressed
      layout - The spring layout object used for positioning
      other - The component which the text field will be located in association to.
      Returns:

    • BuildJButtonInlineToRight

      public static JButton BuildJButtonInlineToRight(int width, int height, String text, int hPad, ActionListener listener, SpringLayout layout, Component other)
      Takes a provided JButton and configures it based upon the provided parameters using a Spring Layout system. The JButton will be positioned by the spring layout to be directly inline horizontally and to the right of the designated component
      Parameters:
      width - The preferred width of the button
      height - The preferred height of the button
      text - The text to be printed on the button
      hPad - The horizontal padding distance between the 2 objects
      listener - The listener object to be informed when the button is pressed
      layout - The spring layout object used for positioning
      other - The component which the text field will be located in association to.
      Returns:

    • BuildJButtonInlineBelow

      public static JButton BuildJButtonInlineBelow(int width, int height, String text, int vPad, ActionListener listener, SpringLayout layout, Component other)
      Takes a provided JButton and configures it based upon the provided parameters using a Spring Layout system. The JButton will be positioned by the spring layout to be directly inline vertically and to the bottom of the designated component
      Parameters:
      width - The preferred width of the button
      height - The preferred height of the button
      text - The text to be printed on the button
      vPad - The vertical padding distance between the 2 objects
      listener - The listener object to be informed when the button is pressed
      layout - The spring layout object used for positioning
      other - The component which the text field will be located in association to.
